title.rendered: Summer Internship 2025 at NIT Tiruchirappalli [For UG Students, 2 Interns, 1 Month, Stipend of Rs. 5k, April 15 – June 30]: Apply by March 28

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for Summer Internship 2025 at NIT Tiruchirappalli for UG Students. The last date of application is March 28.

About NITT

The National Institute of Technology Tiruchirappalli is a national research deemed university near the city of Tiruchirappalli in Tamil Nadu, India. It was founded as Regional Engineering College Tiruchirappalli in 1964 by the governments of India and Tamil Nadu under the affiliation of the University of Madras.

The institution offers Under Graduate Courses in ten branches and Post Graduate Courses in twenty-one disciplines of Science, Engineering & Technology besides M.S. (by Research) and Ph.D. in all the departments. The faculty is inducted through a process of open advertisement throughout the country. The institute is an example of cultural unity with students drawn from most of the states in the country. 

Admissions to the undergraduate course is competitive, and done through JEE(Main) through the Central Seat Allocation Board (CSAB). Admission to the post-graduate programs require competitive scores in both GATE and an All India Entrance Exam conducted by the admitting department. The alumni of the institution have excelled in various fields and are well positioned in a number of government and private sectors.

About The Program

Applications are invited from the third year and final year B.E./B.Tech. Mechanical Engineering students of various institutions for undergoing an internship at the Department of Mechanical Engineering under Scientific Social Responsibility (SSR) of the SERB-project (CRG/2023/004486).

Title of the Project

Detection of Crack Orientation in 3D Printed Composite Plate using Shearlet Transform.

Essential Qualification

Currently pursuing third year and final year B.E./B.Tech.(Mechanical) with good academic background.

Desirable

Knowledge of SOLIDWORKS, COMSOL, ANSYS AND MATLAB Programming.

Number of Interns Required

2

Duration

One month only (April 15 2025 and June 30 2025).

Benefits

  • Stipend of Rs. 5000/- per month.
  • A certificate will be issued to the intern uponcompletion of the assigned tasks.

How to Apply

Interested students can fill out the online application with the Google Form.

Deadline

Apply on or before 28th March 2025(11:59 PM).
